title: Provider
description: Defines the DSC Resource as a DSC Resource Provider. A DSC Resource Provider enables users to manage resources that don't have their own manifests with DSC.

list.title: List Command
list.description: Defines how DSC must call the DSC Resource Provider to list its supported DSC Resources.

config.title: Expected Configuration
config.description: Defines whether the provider expects to receive a full and unprocessed configuration as a single JSON blob over stdin or a sequence of JSON Lines for each child resource's configurations.
